text: (minisunē!) ahashida, bhūmiyehida, æti dæya niyata vaśayenma allāh obaṭa vasan̆ga kara dī ættēya yannada, ohu tama varaprasādayan guptavada, prasiddhiyēda, oba kerehi pahaḷa kara ættēya yannada, oba duṭuvē nædda? (mē siyalla mesē tibiyadī) minisungen samaharek adhyāpana dænuma hō (tarkānukūla) ṛju mārgaya hō ālōkamat dharma (granthayehi sādhakayan) hō nomætiva allāh gæna (nikaruṇē) tarka karannāha.”
